trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Azt mutatja, és frissíti az Active Directory-tárolóban tárolt felhasználói zónatagságságra.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektumot az Active Directory tagsági adattárban egyetlen tagsági felhasználó megjelenítésére szolgál.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Elérhetővé teszi a tagsági felhasználó e-mail címét például információkat, és a funkcionalitást biztosítja a tagsági felhasználó például módosítása vagy új jelszavát.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektum az alkalmazás tagsági szolgáltató adja vissza, ha az alkalmazás egy Active Directory adattár használatára van konfigurálva.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: Egy alkalmazásban konfigurálható különböző adatokat tárolja, vagy egy alkalmazásban több adattárolókhoz használó, olvassa el a az alaposztály, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: Mivel a ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektum nem valósítja meg a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>és <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>Tulajdonságok, elő kell kezelni a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>, amely ezekről a tagokról ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektumon történő hozzáféréskor fordul elő.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser osztály megvalósít által használt belső optimalizálás a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>attribútum frissítések fordulhat elő, amikor a program meghívja a lehető legkevesebb osztályt a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Azt is rendezi sorba a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>ábrázolását (érhető el a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>tulajdonság), hogy egy ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektum szerializált, és nem jelez kivételt deszerializálni.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Egy ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektumot ad vissza a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>és <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>módszerek vagy részeként egy <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>által visszaadott a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Egy ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser objektumot igényel a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metódust, ha meg szeretné frissíteni a meglévő tagsági felhasználó adatait.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser tulajdonságainak vannak leképezve az Active Directory-attribútumok.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: A következő táblázat a ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser tulajdonságok és azok alapértelmezett attribútum-leképezésekhez.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | Tulajdonság |} Alapértelmezett attribútuma |} Képezhetők? |} |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| Igen, de a userPrincipalName vagy sAMAccountName lehet |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| Igen, de egy Unicode karakterlánc típusú egyértékű attribútumnak kell lennie. |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| Nem használható által <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| Nem használható által <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|} nincs, de meg kell feleltetni attribútum használata a biztonsági kérdések és válaszok a jelszó alaphelyzetbe állítása vagy lekérés. |} Igen, de egy Unicode karakterlánc típusú egyértékű attribútumnak kell lennie. |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) |} Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|} alapján kiszámított `lockoutTime` és AD kizárás időtartamát (a Windows 2000 rendszeren AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(A Windows Server 2003 AD)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) |} Nem |} | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| Ha túl sok helytelen jelszó kísérlet miatt zárolt, a zárolási idő attribútum ad vissza.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ha túl sok helytelen jelszómegadás miatt zárolt kísérli meg, az attribútum által megadott tárolt érték `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Zárolt hibás jelszó és a túl sok helytelen jelszó miatt kísérleteket, ha a legutóbbi dátum/idő értéket ad vissza.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: Ha a fiók nincs zárolva, térjen vissza az 1/1/1753 SQL kompatibilitás. |} Nem |}

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja egy <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> osztály-objektumot a <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser konstruktor nem célja, hogy a felhasználói kódból használható.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy új példányt a <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> a megadott tulajdonságértéket osztályt.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Új létrehozása <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektum nem adja hozzá egy új tagsági felhasználói objektum a tagság adattár.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tagság adattárba tagsági új felhasználó hozzáadásához használja a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Vegye figyelembe, hogy a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metódus értéket ad vissza egy <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>a tagsági felhasználó hozzáadni az adattár-objektumot.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektumok gyakran össze alkalmazáskód való használatra a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metódus, bár is átadhatja egy <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektumot adott vissza a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, vagy <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metódust a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metódus, valamint.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektumok is állít elő tagsági szolgáltató megvalósításait a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>a tagsági felhasználó-címét.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>a tagsági felhasználó értékét.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>a tagsági felhasználó értékét.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Ez a paraméter nem használható.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Ez a paraméter nem használható.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>a tagsági felhasználó.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a tagsági felhasználó alkalmazás-specifikus adatait.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: A Megjegyzés tulajdonság egyéni információk az alkalmazásra vonatkoznak, tagsági felhasználó tárolására használható.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: A tárolt adatok mennyiségének a `Comment` tulajdonsága egy <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>határozzák meg a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: A Megjegyzés tulajdonság van leképezve a `Comment` alapértelmezett Active Directory-attribútumot.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság nem rendelhető egy másik attribútum.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Alkalmazás-specifikus adatait az Active Directory tag tárolja a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> attribútuma.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a tagsági felhasználó e-mail címét.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Az e-mailek tulajdonság van leképezve a `Mail` attribútuma.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Úgy, hogy ez a tulajdonság is rendelhető a Web.config fájlban a `attributeMapUserName` attribútumnak a [szolgáltatók elem (ASP.NET beállítási séma) profil](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) elem profilokhoz.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A tagsági felhasználó e-mail címe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a tagsági felhasználó hitelesítése.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>érték a tagsági felhasználó be van jelölve, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> hívása során</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: A IsApproved tulajdonság-visszatérési értéke `false`, a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metódus beolvasása `false` akkor is, ha a megadott felhasználónév és jelszó helyességét.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: A IsApproved tulajdonság van leképezve a következő Active Directory-attribútumok egyikét.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Az Active Directory |} `User-Account-Control`| | Az Active Directory Alkalmazásmódú |} `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| Ez a tulajdonság nem rendelhető egy másik attribútum.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a felhasználó hitelesítése; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NotSupportedException>Minden esetben kivételt</xref:System.NotSupportedException> okoz

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>osztály</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> nem támogatja a LastActivityDate tulajdonságot

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Megpróbálja beolvasni vagy beállítani az érték mindig kivételhibát <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Mindig egy <xref:System.NotSupportedException>kivétel.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.
trans-unit.target: bármely megpróbálja beolvasni vagy megadni a LastActivityDate tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Jelez a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>minden esetben kivétel.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastLoginDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>osztály</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> nem támogatja a LastLoginDate tulajdonságot

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Megpróbálja beolvasni vagy beállítani az érték mindig kivételhibát <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Mindig egy <xref:System.NotSupportedException>kivétel.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastLoginDate property.
trans-unit.target: bármely megpróbálja beolvasni vagy megadni a LastLoginDate tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A felhasználói azonosító lekérése az Active Directory adattárolóból. a tagsági felhasználó.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: A ProviderUserKey tulajdonság mutatja meg az általános típusú adatforrás tagságát azonosító egy `object`.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: A ProviderUserKey osztály lehet konvertálni, mint egy <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objektum.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: A tagsági felhasználó tárolja a felhasználói azonosító az Active Directory-adatokból.
